definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly

sentences.english: If the temperature is below 0℃ please use Varlon Brand anti-freeze glass cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 如氣溫低於此溫度，可使用慧霖牌防凍型玻璃水。

sentences.english: Industrial calcium chloride aqueous solution used as anti-icing fluid has some corrosive action to common metals.
sentences.chinese: 工業氯化鈣水溶液作爲防凍液有一定的腐蝕性。

sentences.english: And its also used as a freezproof agent and anti-freezing agent.
sentences.chinese: 作爲防凍劑和融雪劑廣泛用於融雪化冰。

sentences.english: But small amount anti-freeze was added to it. And that seem to solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 但是加入了一些防凍劑，這貌似可以解決這個問題了。

sentences.english: Make sure your vehicle has fresh antifreeze.
sentences.chinese: 確認您的車輛有新鮮的防凍液。

sentences.english: Shall I put some anti- freeze in the radiator?
sentences.chinese: 要不要在散熱器裏注入一些防凍劑？

sentences.english: Strengthen research into and product development of anti-seepage, anti-freezing and anti-expansion ditch technologies. 2.2.
sentences.chinese: 加強渠道防滲防凍脹技術的研究和產品開發。

sentences.english: Fast and accurate testing of anti-freeze strength.
sentences.chinese: 快速準確地檢測防凍抗力。

sentences.english: Oil storage in ports: thermal insulation for the media pipes and freeze protection for water pipes.
sentences.chinese: 港口碼頭油庫介質管線的伴熱保溫和水管線的防凍。

sentences.english: An antifreeze is a liquid that is added to water to keep it from freezing.
sentences.chinese: 防凍液是一種液體，加入到水中可防止水結凍。

sentences.english: Antifreeze poisonings are one of the most common poisonings of small animals.
sentences.chinese: 防凍液中毒是小動物的最常見的中毒之一。

sentences.english: Tommy kicked over a gallon of antifreeze and disappeared into the locker room.
sentences.chinese: 湯米一腳踢翻了一桶防凍液，消失在更衣室裏。

sentences.english: Antifreezing efficiency is one of the key measures.
sentences.chinese: 是防凍增效的關鍵措施之一。

sentences.english: The cement cannot in the open work, probably take the frostproof measure.
sentences.chinese: 水泥不能在露天施工，要採取防凍措施。

sentences.english: Apply to replacement of the cooling fluid or antifreeze used before.
sentences.chinese: 適用於更換冷卻液或防凍液前使用。

sentences.english: Light should be left in place for winterization.
sentences.chinese: 燈應該被適當留在防凍處理地。
